actions.in_committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Human Resources.

official_title: A bill to amend the Community Services Act of 1974 to permit the Director of the Community Services Administration to furnish assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.

summary.text: Amends the Community Services Act of 1974 to authorize the Director of the Community Services Administration to furnish assistance for the installation of security devices in, and structural modification or alteration of, residences of elderly persons for the prevention of unlawful entry.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Community Services Act of 1974 to permit the Director of the Community Services Administration to furnish assistance for the installation of security devices in the residences of elderly persons.
